comment._content: That's amazing, to be able to see him on film. Thanks for finding that link and sharing it on this site.

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/69717788@N04]  Great find, thank you so much.

comment.author: 16830149@N02
comment._content:
His death is recorded as 1960 not 1970
The Times, Friday, Aug 19, 1960; pg. 12; Issue 54854; col D 
Category: Obituaries
"Mr Pat O'Keefe, a former British middleweight boxing champion, who retired from the ring in 1918, died in hospital on Tuesday.  He was 77, and was the oldest surviving British boxing champion."

comment.author: 70046327@N03
comment._content: Commenting on behalf of my boyfriend (his great grandson)...name is O'KEEFFE

comment.author: 70124836@N08
comment._content: Wow, this is amazing! My mother saw this picture in the times newspaper today, and recognised it straight away because it's of her grandfather. My mother has an autobiography at her house, with this picture as the front cover. Unfortunately the book as well as this has spelt the Name wrong, as said in comment above. its O'KeefFe. I did a presentation about him for my Royal Navy leadership course, so i have all the pics i scanned from the book that i will attempt to share on this site. if there is anyway of putting my presentation on here i will, i had plenty  more information bout him and would love to share it here. my e-mail is okeeffemarc@hotmail.com

comment.author: 70124836@N08
comment._content: www.flickr.com/photos/70124836@N08/ here are all the photo i have of him, scanned from his autobio. i can get hold of this Auto biography if the IWM is interested?

comment.author: 62508825@N00
comment._content: re Arnham's comment at the top - see www.britishpathe.com/record.php?id=84032 Unfortunately, this is not footage of O'Keefe in training. Despite the title, it is actually Sullivan in training for a fight with O'Keefe.

comment.author: 66852811@N03
comment._content: My grandad Pat O'Keffe. Hello Marc, your mum just brought this to my attention. It would be wonderful if there was any footage of him training or fighting.

comment.author: 32300107@N06
comment._content: Marc thanks for adding all those images - its fantastic that there is so much information available about him so thanks for sharing it.

comment.author: 69173777@N07
comment._content: Tremendous photo! There are some pictures of boxers who fought in the Great War (including another of Pat O'Keefe) here: www.flickr.com/photos/69173777@N07/sets/72157628278025901/ Hope to add some more pics to that set soon.
